mapper.select: SELECT j.fid, j.fwelded_junction_no, j.fserial_no, j.foperator fwelderid, w.fwelder_no fpipeline_no, w.fname froom_no, r.fmachineid, m.fequipment_no funit, j.fitemId iid, i.fname iname, (case when r.frealstarttime >= #{startTime} OR r.foperatetype = 1 then r.foperatetype ELSE NULL END) fsystems, r.frealstarttime fstart_time, j.fend_time, r.fwelderid foperator, ww.fwelder_no fchildren, ww.fname fspecification FROM tb_welded_junction j LEFT JOIN tb_taskresult r ON r.ftaskid = j.fid INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON j.fitemId = i.fid LEFT JOIN tb_welder w ON j.foperator = w.fid LEFT JOIN tb_welder ww ON r.fwelderid = ww.fid LEFT JOIN tb_welding_machine m ON r.fmachineid = m.fid WHERE 1 = 1 AND r.foperatetype!=3 AND r.fid IN (SELECT MAX(fid) FROM tb_taskresult GROUP BY ftaskid,fwelderid,fmachineid) OR r.foperatetype IS null ORDER BY r.foperatedate asc
SELECT j.*, i.fid iid, i.fname iname FROM tb_welded_junction j INNER JOIN tb_insframework i ON j.fitemId = i.fid WHERE j.fid = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_welded_junction(fwelded_junction_no, froom_no, fitemId, fstart_time, fend_time, fcreatedate) values (#{weldedJunctionno}, #{roomNo}, #{iid}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, now());
mapper.update: update tb_welded_junction set fwelded_junction_no=#{weldedJunctionno}, froom_no=#{roomNo}, fitemId=#{iid}, fstart_time=#{startTime}, fend_time=#{endTime} where fid = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into tb_taskresult(ftaskid, fwelderid, fmachineid, foperatedate, frealstarttime, frealendtime, foperatetype, foperator, fresult, fresultid) values (#{taskid}, #{welderid}, #{machineid}, now(), #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{dyne}, #{operatorid}, #{area}, #{children});
mapper.update: update tb_taskresult set ftaskid=#{taskid}, fwelderid=#{welderid}, fmachineid=#{machineid}, foperatedate=now(), frealstarttime=#{startTime}, frealendtime=#{endTime}, foperatetype=#{dyne}, foperator=#{operatorid}, fresult=#{area}, fresultid=#{children} where fid = #{id};
